sentences.sContent: The endurance, however, is sure to bolster him to probe so as to be"better".
sentences.sContent_eng: The endurance, however, is sure to bolster him to probe so as to be"better".
sentences.sCn: 但是，人的忍耐力必将支撑着人坚实地向前探索，使人变得“更好”。

sentences.sContent: Yesterday's results will also bolster calls for more children to study science and maths A-levels – which are typically needed to take an engineering degree.
sentences.sContent_eng: Yesterday's results will also bolster calls for more children to study science and maths A-levels – which are typically needed to take an engineering degree.
sentences.sCn: 昨日的结果也支持让更多的孩子学习科学和A级数学的呼吁，因为这些学科对于学习工程学是非常必要的。

phrases.pCn: 护索板；支承板；压床垫板
